translation.en: Never thought it was.
So spread the word out at the rez, huh? Keep the kids out of the woods.
translation.ja: 情報を広めて子供を森に入れるな

translation.en: Will do. Don't want no one else getting hurt, do we?
translation.ja: 分かった　もう人が殺されるのは ご免だ

translation.en: This is incredible.
It's so light and open, you know?
translation.ja: 明るくて開放的なのね

translation.en: What did you expect, coffins and dungeons and moats?
translation.ja: 何を期待してた？ 棺(ひつぎ)や地下牢や城壁？

translation.en: No, not the moats.
translation.ja: 違うわ 城壁なんて

translation.en: Not the moats.
This is the one place we don't have to hide.
translation.ja: 唯一 くつろげる場所だ

translation.en: I told them not to do this.
[man on TV] You add a little bit of olive oil to a non-stick saute pan,
translation.ja: 鍋にオリーブオイルを入れて—

translation.en: and you want to cook with the olive oil in medium-high heat.
translation.ja: 中くらいの強火で温めます

translation.en: What I do, I cut this in strips, and then we gonna cut this...
Is she even Italian?
Her name is Bella.
I'm sure she'll love it, no matter what.
-[door opens] -[Rosalie] Whoo! Get a whiff of that.
[in a singsong voice] Here comes the human.
Bella, we're making Italiano for you.
translation.ja: ベラ　あなたにイタリア料理を

translation.en: Bella, this is Esme, my mother for all intents and purposes.
translation.ja: 彼女はエズミ僕の母親のような存在だ

translation.en: You've given us an excuse to use the kitchen for the first time.
translation.ja: 初めてキッチンを使った

translation.en: I hope you're hungry.
Yeah, absolutely.
She already ate.
Perfect.
Yeah, it's just because I know that you guys don't eat--
translation.ja: 食事はしない ご家族かと

translation.en: Of course. It's very considerate of you.
translation.ja: 気を遣ってくれたのね

translation.en: -Just ignore Rosalie. I do. -[Rosalie] Yeah.
Let's just keep pretending like this isn't dangerous for all of us.
translation.ja: 人間を呼ぶなんてやっぱり危険よ

translation.en: I would never tell anybody anything.
translation.ja: 誰にも言わないわひと言も

translation.en: She knows that.
Yeah, well, the problem is, you two have gone public now, so--
translation.ja: でも２人の仲は知られてるから…

translation.en: No, she should know.
The entire family will be implicated if this ends badly.
translation.ja: この出会いは最悪の結果になるかも

translation.en: Badly, as in...
I would become the meal.
Hi, Bella.
I'm Alice.
Oh! You do smell good.
Alice, what are you--
It's okay. Bella and I are gonna be great friends.
translation.ja: 大丈夫いい友達になるわ

translation.en: [Carlisle] Sorry, Jasper's our newest vegetarian. It's a little difficult for him.
translation.ja: ジャスパーは新入りだから自制が利きにくい

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you.
It's okay, Jasper. You won't hurt her.
translation.ja: 平気よあなたは食べないから

translation.en: All right, I'm gonna take you on a tour of the rest of the house.
translation.ja: 家の中を案内してくるよ

translation.en: Well, I'll see you soon.
Okay.
-Cute! -I know.
I think that went well.
Clean this up. Now.
Was that as weird for you as it was for me?
Uh, I don't know.
Graduation caps?
Yeah. It's a private joke.
translation.ja: そうなんだ 冗談で作った何度も卒業するから

translation.en: We matriculate a lot.
translation.ja: 冗談で作った何度も卒業するから

translation.en: That's kind of miserable. I mean, repeating high school over and over.
translation.ja: 高校生活を繰り返すなんてかわいそう

translation.en: True, but the younger we start out in a new place, the longer we can stay there.
translation.ja: でも若く住み始めればその分 長く住める

translation.en: Come on.
Yeah, this is my room.
No bed?
No, I don't...
I don't sleep.
Ever?
No, not at all.
Okay. Mm...
Boy, you have so much music.
translation.ja: ＣＤが たくさんあるのね

translation.en: What are you listening to?
It's Debussy.
Claire De Lune is great.
What?
I can't dance.
Well, I could always make you.
I'm not scared of you.
Well, you really shouldn't have said that.
You better hold on tight, spider monkey.
translation.ja: つかまって　クモザルだ

translation.en: Do you trust me?
In theory.
Then close your eyes.
What?
[chuckles] This isn't real.
This kind of stuff just doesn't exist.
translation.ja: こんなこと できるのね

translation.en: It does in my world.
It's human.
Arizona. Yo, what's happening?
translation.ja: アリゾナ君 元気か？

translation.en: So you and Cullen, huh?
That's... I don't like it.
I mean, I don't know, he just looks at you like you're something to eat.
translation.ja: 彼が君を見る目食べ物でも見るみたいだ

translation.en: Here's your veggie plate, Stephenie.
Hey, sorry I'm late. Biology project.
translation.ja: お待たせ　生物の課題で

translation.en: I ordered you the spinach salad. I hope that's okay.
translation.ja: ほうれん草のサラダを頼んだよ

translation.en: You should order one for yourself next time. Cut back on the steak.
translation.ja: パパもステーキを控えてサラダを

translation.en: Hey, I'm as healthy as a horse.
translation.ja: パパは健康そのものだ

translation.en: Say, Chief, boys want to know...
translation.ja: 署長皆が知りたがってるわ

translation.en: Did you find anything down by Queets River today?
translation.ja: クイーツ川で何が出たか

translation.en: Yeah, we found a bare human footprint,
but it looks like whoever that is is headed east so Kitsap County sheriff is gonna take over from here.
translation.ja: だが東へ向いてたからキットサップ郡の管轄だ

translation.en: I just hope they catch him fast.
Looks like your friends are flagging you.
It's okay if you wanna go join them. I'm just gonna turn in early anyway.
translation.ja: 一緒に遊んでいいぞパパは早く寝る

translation.en: Me, too.
Bella, it's Friday night. Go out.
translation.ja: 金曜の夜だ　出かけてこい

translation.en: Looks like the Newton boy's got a big smile for you.
translation.ja: 彼は お前に気があるらしい

translation.en: Yeah, he's a good buddy.
What about any of these other yahoos in town? Anybody interest you?
translation.ja: ほかの野郎どもは どうだ？誰かいるか？

translation.en: Dad, we gonna talk about boys?
Yeah, I guess not.
I just feel like I leave you alone too much.
translation.ja: パパは あまりかまってやれないから—

translation.en: You should be around people.
translation.ja: もっと人と付き合えよ

translation.en: I don't really mind being alone.
I guess I'm kind of like my dad in that way.
So, how's all the baseball stuff going?
Oh, Phil's working so hard.
You know, spring training.
We're looking for a house to rent in case things become more permanent.
translation.ja: 様子を見て家を探すわ

translation.en: You'd like Jacksonville, baby.
I'm really liking Forks.
Forks is growing on me.
Could a guy have anything to do with that?
Well, yeah.
I knew it. Tell me everything. What is he? Jock? Indie?
translation.ja: やっぱりね スポーツマン？一匹オオカミ？

translation.en: -I bet he's smart. Is he smart? -[gasps]
Mom, can I talk to you later?
translation.ja: ママ　今度にしよう

translation.en: Come on, we gotta talk boys. Are you being safe?
How did you get in here?
The window.
Do you do that a lot?
Well, just the past couple of months.
I like watching you sleep. It's, uh...
translation.ja: 君の寝顔を見るのが好きさ

translation.en: It's kind of fascinating to me.
I always want to try one thing.
Just stay very still.
Don't move.
Stop it!
I'm sorry.
I'm stronger than I thought.
Yeah. I wish I could say the same.
I can't ever lose control with you.
Hey, don't go.
-Hey, got you another one. -Thanks.
I have a date with Edward Cullen.
translation.ja: エドワードとデートを

translation.en: He's a little old for you, isn't he?
No.
He's a junior. I'm a junior.
I thought you liked the Cullens.
I thought you didn't like any of the boys in town.
translation.ja: 町の男に興味ないかと

translation.en: Edward doesn't live in town. Technically.
translation.ja: 彼は町には住んでないわ正確にはね

translation.en: He's right outside.
He is?
Yeah, he wanted to meet you, officially.
translation.ja: パパに ちゃんと挨拶したいって

translation.en: All right. Bring him in.
Could you be nice?
He's... he's important.
Chief Swan.
I want to formally introduce myself. I'm Edward Cullen.
translation.ja: 自己紹介をエドワード･カレンです

translation.en: Hi, Edward.
Bella won't be out too late tonight. She's just gonna play baseball with my family.
translation.ja: ベラは僕の家族と野球を

translation.en: Baseball?
Yes, sir, that's the plan.
[chuckles] Bella's gonna play baseball.
Well, good luck with that.
I'll take good care of her. I promise.
Still got that pepper spray?
[whispers] Yeah, Dad.
And since when do vampires like baseball?
Well, it's the American pastime
and there's a thunderstorm coming.
translation.ja: 今日は雷が鳴るから野球ができるんだ

translation.en: It's the only time we can play. You'll see why.
translation.ja: 今日は雷が鳴るから野球ができるんだ まあ見てて

translation.en: Glad you're here. We need an umpire.
She thinks we cheat.
I know you cheat.
Call them as you see them, Bella.
Okay.
It's time.
Okay, now I see why you need the thunder.
That's gotta be a home run, right?
Edward's very fast.
-You're out. -Out! Whoo!
Babe, come on. It's just a game.
Nice kitty.
My monkey man.
Stop!
They were leaving. Then they heard us.
Let's go.
It's too late.
Get your hair down.
Like that'll help. I could smell her from across the field.
translation.ja: ムダよ匂いはゴマかせない

translation.en: I shouldn't have brought you here. I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: 僕が連れてこなければ

translation.en: Just be quiet and stand behind me.
I believe this belongs to you.
Thank you.
I am Laurent.
And this is Victoria...
and James.
I'm Carlisle. This is my family.
translation.ja: カーライル 彼らは家族だ

translation.en: I'm afraid your hunting activities have caused something of a mess for us.
translation.ja: 君たちの狩りで我々にまで迷惑が

translation.en: Our apologies.
We didn't realize the territory had been claimed.
translation.ja: 縄張りを荒らしたとは

translation.en: Yes, well, we maintain a permanent residence nearby.
translation.ja: この近くに定住してるんだ

translation.en: Really?
Well, we won't be a problem anymore.
translation.ja: もう— 迷惑は かけない

translation.en: We were just passing through.
The humans were tracking us, but we led them east.
translation.ja: 捜査を撹乱(かくらん)して東へ誘導した

translation.en: [whispering] You should be safe.
Excellent.
So, could you use three more players?
translation.ja: あと３人 選手は要らないか？

translation.en: Oh, come on. Just one game.
Sure. Why not?
A few of us were leaving. You could take their place.
We'll bat first.
I'm the one with the wicked curveball.
Well, I think we can handle that.
We shall see.
You brought a snack.
[Laurent] A human?
[Carlisle] The girl is with us. I think it best if you leave.
translation.ja: 私たちの連れだおとなしく下がれ

translation.en: I can see the game is over. We'll go now.
translation.ja: 試合は終わりだ　もう行く

translation.en: James.
[Carlisle] Get Bella out of here.
Go.
Okay, I've got it! I've got it! I'm all right!
-What, now he's coming after me? -[engine starts]
Listen to me. James is a tracker.
translation.ja: ジェームズは狩りが生きがいだ

translation.en: The hunt is his obsession. I read his mind.
translation.ja: ジェームズは狩りが生きがいだ 僕の態度が火を付けた

translation.en: My reaction on the field set him off.
translation.ja: 僕の態度が火を付けた

translation.en: I just made this his most exciting game ever. -He's never gonna stop. -What should we do?
translation.ja: 奴には最高のゲームだ地の果てまで追ってくる

translation.en: We have to kill him. Rip him apart and burn the pieces.
-Where are we going? -Away from Forks.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 船でバンクーバーへ

translation.en: We'll get a ferry to Vancouver.
I have to go home. Now.
translation.ja: 帰らなきゃ　家へ帰して

translation.en: -You have to take me home. -You can't go home.
He's just gonna trace your scent there. It's the first place he's gonna look.
translation.ja: 奴は匂いを追ってまず家へ

translation.en: But my dad is there. We--
[yells] It doesn't matter!
Yes, it does! He could get killed because of us!
Just let me get you out of here first, all right?
It's my dad! We have to go back!
We'll figure a way to lead the tracker away somehow. I don't know. But we have to do something.
translation.ja: 彼をまく手だては何かあるはずよ

translation.en: Edward, I said leave me alone.
-Bella, don't do this, please. -It's over! Get out!
translation.ja: ベラ　頼む 終わりよ　帰って

translation.en: Bella? What's going on?
I just gotta get out of here. I'm leaving. Now.
translation.ja: 私 出てくわ　今すぐに

translation.en: [Charlie] Bella?
What am I gonna say to him?
I can't hurt him.
-Bella, what's going on? -You just have to.
I'll be down at the truck.
Did he hurt you?
No.
Break up with you or something?
No, I broke up with him.
translation.ja: 違う　私がフッたの

translation.en: I thought you liked him.
Yeah, that's why I have to leave. I don't want this. I have to go home.
translation.ja: 彼のいない所へ行きたいのママの家に帰るわ

translation.en: Home? Your...
Your mom's not even in Phoenix.
translation.ja: ママも いないのに？

translation.en: [Bella] She'll come home. I'll call her from the road.
You're not gonna drive home right now.
translation.ja: もう夜だ危ないから明日にしろ

translation.en: You can sleep on it. If you still feel like going in the morning,
translation.ja: もう夜だ危ないから明日にしろ パパが空港まで送る

translation.en: I'll take you to the airport.
No. I want to drive. It'll give me more time to think.
translation.ja: 運転しながらゆっくり考えたいの

translation.en: I mean, if I get really tired, I'll pull into a motel. I promise.
translation.ja: 疲れたらモーテルで休むわ

translation.en: Look, Bella, I know I'm not that much fun to be around,
translation.ja: パパとの生活は退屈だろうが—

translation.en: but I can change that.
translation.ja: 努力するよ　もっと…

translation.en: We can do more stuff together.
translation.ja: 努力するよ　もっと… いろいろ やろう

translation.en: Like what? Like watch baseball on the flat-screen?
translation.ja: たとえば薄型テレビで野球を見たり？

translation.en: Eat at the diner every night? Steak and cobbler?
translation.ja: 毎晩 同じ店で食べたり？

translation.en: Dad, that's you. That's not me.
Bella, come on, I just... [voice breaking] I just got you back.
translation.ja: せっかく２人で暮らし始めたのに

translation.en: Yeah, and, you know, if I don't get out now, then I'm just gonna be stuck here like Mom.
translation.ja: 今 出てかなきゃ窒息するわママみたいに

translation.en: Your father's gonna forgive you.
Why don't you let me drive?
He won't.
You should've seen his face.
I told him the same thing that my mom told him when she was leaving him.
translation.ja: 私 ママと同じセリフを浴びせたの

translation.en: It's the only way he'd let you go.
Just don't worry about him now. He's safe. The tracker's following us.
translation.ja: パパは安全だ奴は こっちを追ってきた

translation.en: -Oh, God. -It's just Emmett.
Alice is in the car behind us.
[Carlisle] Wait.
He came to warn us about James.
translation.ja: 彼がジェームズに用心をと

translation.en: This isn't my fight, and I've grown tired of his games,
translation.ja: おれも奴のゲームにはうんざりなんだ

translation.en: but he's got unparalleled senses, absolutely lethal.
translation.ja: だが あれほど五感の鋭い奴は—

translation.en: I've never seen anything like him in my 300 years.
And the woman, Victoria, don't underestimate her.
translation.ja: ヴィクトリアのことも決して甘く見るな

translation.en: I've had to fight our kind before. We're not easy to kill.
[Emmett] But not impossible.
We'll tear them apart and burn the pieces.
I don't relish the thought of killing another creature, even a sadistic one like James.
translation.ja: 相手が奴であれ我々の同類を殺すとは…

translation.en: What if he kills one of us first?
I'm gonna run Bella south. Can you lead the tracker away from here?
translation.ja: 僕はベラを南へ連れてく

translation.en: No, Edward. James knows you would never leave Bella.
translation.ja: 奴は お前が一緒だと分かってる

translation.en: -He'll follow you. -[Alice] I'll go with Bella.
translation.ja: 奴は お前が一緒だと分かってる ベラは私とジャスパーが連れてく

translation.en: Jasper and I will drive her south.
translation.ja: ベラは私とジャスパーが連れてく

translation.en: I'll keep her safe, Edward.
Can you keep your thoughts to yourself?
Rosalie, Esme,
could you put these on so the tracker will pick up Bella's scent?
translation.ja: 奴がベラの匂いを追うように彼女の服を着てくれ

translation.en: Why? What is she to me?
Rosalie, Bella is with Edward.
translation.ja: ロザリー エドワードの彼女は家族も同然だ

translation.en: She's part of this family now.
translation.ja: エドワードの彼女は家族も同然だ

translation.en: And we protect our family.
Oh, God. If anything... What if...
If anything happens, I swear to God...
Nothing's gonna happen.
There's seven of us, and there's two of them,
translation.ja: 僕らは７人 敵は２人だ

translation.en: and when everything's done, I'm gonna come back and get you.
translation.ja: 奴を倒したら迎えにいく

translation.en: Bella, you are my life now.
translation.ja: もう君は僕のすべてだ

translation.en: Hey, Mom. It's me again.
You must have let your phone die or something.
I'm not in Forks, but everything's okay, and I'll explain it later.
translation.ja: フォークスを出たけど心配しないで　あとで話すわ

translation.en: [Edward] Rosalie, mark the tree.
That's good.
What is it? What do you see?
translation.ja: どうした？　何が見える？

translation.en: He's figured it out.
The tracker, he just changed course.
translation.ja: 奴が追う向きを変えた

translation.en: -Where will it take him, Alice? -Mirrors.
translation.ja: 行き先は？ 鏡の たくさんある部屋

translation.en: A room full of mirrors.
translation.ja: 鏡の たくさんある部屋

translation.en: Edward said the visions weren't always certain.
[Jasper] She sees the course people are on while they're on it. If they change their minds, the vision changes.
translation.ja: もし相手が向きを変えたら見えるものも変わる

translation.en: Okay, so the course that the tracker's on now
translation.ja: じゃ 今はそこへ向かってるのね

translation.en: is gonna lead him to a ballet studio?
translation.ja: じゃ 今はそこへ向かってるのね バレエ教室へ

translation.en: -You've been here? -I took lessons as a kid.
translation.ja: 知ってるの？ 子供の頃 通ってた

translation.en: The school I went to had an arch just like that.
Was your school here in Phoenix?
-Edward, are you okay? -We've lost the tracker.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 奴を見失った

translation.en: The woman's still in the area.
Rosalie and Esme are going back to Forks to protect your father.
translation.ja: エズミたちは君のパパの所へ

translation.en: I'm coming to get you. Then you and I are gonna go somewhere alone.
translation.ja: 僕は— 君を迎えにいく２人だけで どこかへ行こう

translation.en: And the others will keep hunting.
I'll do whatever it takes to make you safe again.
translation.ja: 何があっても僕が君を守る

translation.en: Hey, Mom, I'm glad you got my message. What are you doing home?
translation.ja: ママ　伝言を聞いたのねなぜ家に？

translation.en: [Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
translation.ja: ベラ　どこにいるの？

translation.en: -Calm down, everything's fine. -Bella? Bella?
-I'll explain everything later... -[rustling]
Mom, are you there?
[James] Forks High School doesn't protect its students' privacy very well.
translation.ja: フォークス高校は個人情報の扱いが甘い

translation.en: It was just too easy for Victoria to find your previous address.
translation.ja: 以前の住所は— 難なく捜し出せたよ

translation.en: It's a nice house you have here.
I was prepared to wait for you,
but then Mom came home after she received a very worried call from your dad,
translation.ja: ママが帰ってきたパパから連絡があったとさ

translation.en: and it all worked out quite well.
-Mm. -[Renee] Wait, wait...
Don't touch her! Don't...
-You can still save her. -[Bella] Don't!
But you're gonna have to get away from your friends.
Can you handle that?
Where should I meet you?
How about your old ballet studio?
translation.ja: バレエ教室は どうだ？

translation.en: And I'll know if you bring anyone along.
Poor Mommy would pay the price for that mistake.
translation.ja: その代償はママが払う

translation.en: [Bella] I'd never given much thought to how I would die.
translation.ja: 私は どんなふうに死ぬ？

translation.en: But dying in the place of someone I love seems like a good way to go.
translation.ja: もし愛する人の身代わりならいい死に方だ

translation.en: I can't bring myself to regret the decisions that brought me face-to-face with death.
translation.ja: 私は決心した死に直面しても後悔はない

translation.en: They also brought me to Edward.
[Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
translation.ja: ベラ　どこにいるの？

translation.en: -Mom? -Bella?
-Mom? -There you are. What are you doing in here?
[young Bella] Everyone makes fun of me.
[Renee] Come on, you're a wonderful dancer.
Mom, I suck.
translation.ja: ママ　私はヘタッピよ

translation.en: That's my favorite part.
You were a stubborn child, weren't you?
translation.ja: 強情な子だったんだな

translation.en: -She's not even here. -No.
[James] Sorry.
You know, but you really made it too easy.
translation.ja: ずいぶん簡単にだまされたな

translation.en: So, to make things more entertaining,
translation.ja: 盛り上げないと楽しくない

translation.en: I'm gonna make a little film of our time together.
I borrowed this from your house. I hope you don't mind.
translation.ja: このカメラお前の家から拝借したよ

translation.en: And...
action.
Oh. That'll break Edward's little heart.
translation.ja: そんな顔エドワードが悲しむぜ

translation.en: You have... Edward has nothing to do with this!
But he does.
Oh, his rage will make for more interesting sport
translation.ja: あいつは怒らせた方がずっと面白い

translation.en: than his feeble attempt to protect you.
translation.ja: あいつは怒らせた方がずっと面白い お前を守ってる時よりもな

translation.en: And let's continue.
Beautiful. Very visually dynamic.
translation.ja: すばらしい ダイナミックな映像だ

translation.en: I chose my stage well.
translation.ja: ここが晩さんの舞台さ

translation.en: It's too bad he didn't have the strength to turn you.
translation.ja: 奴は お前を吸血鬼にせず—

translation.en: Instead, he kept you this fragile little human.
translation.ja: か弱い人間のままにした

translation.en: It's cruel, really.
Tell Edward how much it hurts.
Tell him to avenge you. Tell him!
No, Edward, don't!
Tell him! Tell him!
You're alone 'cause you're faster than the others.
translation.ja: １人か お前は最速だからな

translation.en: But not stronger.
I'm strong enough to kill you.
I'm sorry.
-Bella, Bella, it's okay. -Son.
translation.ja: しっかり エドワード

translation.en: Enough.
Remember who you are.
[Carlisle] Bella needs you.
It's okay.
Carlisle? Her blood.
-[Carlisle] Your brothers will take care of him. -I got him.
translation.ja: あとは任せろ 捕まえた

translation.en: -[Alice] Carlisle! -Start the fire. [Emmett] Get the floorboards.
[Jasper] Alice!
Alice, go.
Her femoral artery's been severed. She's losing too much blood.
translation.ja: 動脈を切った　出血がひどい

translation.en: No, no, my head is burning!
It's the venom.
You have to make a choice. You could let the change happen.
translation.ja: 決めろ　彼女を吸血鬼に？

translation.en: No.
No.
It's gonna happen, Edward. I've seen it.
It doesn't have to be that way.
She's still hemorrhaging. Alice, make me a tourniquet. Your belt.
translation.ja: アリス　ベルトで止血しろ

translation.en: Carlisle, what's my other option?
translation.ja: 僕は どうしたらいい？

translation.en: Tie it above my hands.
Carlisle!
Go.
We could try to suck the venom out.
You know I won't be able to stop.
Then find the will to stop.
But choose. She only has minutes left.
translation.ja: やるんだ　時間がない

translation.en: I'm gonna make it go away, Bella.
I'm gonna make it go away.
Edward, stop. Her blood is clean. You're killing her.
translation.ja: やめろ　それ以上は死んでしまう

translation.en: Edward.
Stop.
[softly] Stop.
Find the will.
[Bella] Death is peaceful, easy.
translation.ja: 死は穏やかで— 楽だ

translation.en: Life is harder.
Bella?
[whispering] Bella.
-Mom? -Hey.
Where is he?
Where's Edward?
He's asleep.
He never leaves.
And your dad, he's down at the cafeteria.
What happened?
Well, when you fell, you broke your leg,
and you lost a lot of blood.
You don't remember any of this, do you?
Edward came down with his dad to try to convince you to come back to Forks.
translation.ja: エドワードたちは“町に残れ”と説得しに来た

translation.en: So you went over to their hotel, then you tripped,
translation.ja: あなたは彼らのホテルで—

translation.en: and you fell down two flights of stairs.
Went through a window!
Yeah, that sounds like me.
Oh, honey, I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: ベラ　かわいそうに

translation.en: It's Phil.
He's so worried about you.
You're texting.
[chuckles] Finally, yeah.
I told him to stay down in Florida.
Honey, you are gonna love Jacksonville. It's sunny every day,
translation.ja: ジャクソンヴィルは毎日 太陽が照ってる

translation.en: and we found the cutest little house, and you've got your own bathroom--
translation.ja: 家には あなた専用の浴室もあるわ

translation.en: Mom, I still want to live in Forks.
I want to live in Forks.
Well, okay, we'll talk about it.
translation.ja: 構わないけどよく話しましょ

translation.en: Do you mind getting Dad?
I have to talk to him. Apologize.
translation.ja: 話があるの　謝らなきゃ

translation.en: Okay, baby. I'll go get him.
translation.ja: いいわ　呼んでくる

translation.en: And I'll go get a nurse, okay?
So what happened? Where's James?
translation.ja: あれからどうなったの？ジェームズは？

translation.en: We took care of it.
And the woman, Victoria, she ran off.
translation.ja: ヴィクトリアは逃げた

translation.en: I'm alive because of you.
No, you're in here because of me.
translation.ja: 僕のせいで こんなことに

translation.en: The worst part of it was that...
translation.ja: 僕は君の血を吸う途中で—

translation.en: I thought I wasn't gonna be able to stop.
translation.ja: 止められないと思った

translation.en: You did stop.
Bella, you gotta go to Jacksonville so I can't hurt you anymore.
translation.ja: ジャクソンヴィルで暮らせ僕は君を傷つける

translation.en: Are you... No!
translation.ja: そんなのイヤよ　絶対に！

translation.en: [stuttering] I don't even know what you're... How...
translation.ja: よくそんなこと 言えるわ

translation.en: What are you talking about? You want me to go away? I can't...
translation.ja: 私に遠くへ行けと言うの？

translation.en: No, I can't... I can't just leave you...
translation.ja: あなたと離れられるわけない

translation.en: I know.
We can't be apart. You can't leave me.
I'm here.
Okay, just don't...
You just can't say stuff like that to me. Ever.
translation.ja: “離れろ”なんて二度と言わないで

translation.en: Where else am I gonna go?
translation.ja: 僕のいる場所は君のそばしかない

translation.en: Alice lent me the dress.
The cast is...
You're perfect.
I'll take care of her, Chief Swan.
Uh-huh. I've heard that before.
Uh, Bells...
I put a new can of pepper spray in your bag.
translation.ja: バッグに防犯スプレーを

translation.en: Dad.
And...
Well, you look beautiful.
Thanks.
See you.
Hey. I'll be right back.
-Bella. -[Bella] Jacob.
Nice.
You, too.
Are you crashing the prom or something? Did you come with a date?
No.
My dad paid me to come talk to you.
translation.ja: 親父が“金をやるベラに話せ”と

translation.en: Twenty bucks.
Let's hear it.
Just don't get mad, okay?
He wants you to break up with your boyfriend.
It's just, he said, quote,
"We'll be watching you."
-[laughs] -Okay, well, tell him, "Thanks."
-And to pay up. -Okay. Let me help you.
translation.ja: 請求もね つかまって

translation.en: [Edward] Jacob. I'll take it from here.
translation.ja: ジェイコブ　あとは結構だ

translation.en: Guess I'll see you around, Bella.
I leave you alone for two minutes, and the wolves descend.
translation.ja: ちょっと目を離したスキにオオカミが

translation.en: I can't believe you're making me do this.
Just smile.
Wow. You are really trying to kill me.
translation.ja: やっぱり私にはムリだわ

translation.en: The prom is an important rite of passage. I didn't want you to miss anything.
translation.ja: プロムは大人への儀式だ外せないよ

translation.en: -Do you want to go? -Yeah.
[Eric] All right, slowing it down.
Shall we?
You're serious?
Oh, why not?
See, you're dancing.
At prom.
Edward, why did you save me?
If you just let the venom spread,
I could be like you by now.
You don't know what you're saying.
-You don't want this. -I want you.
translation.ja: いけない あなたのそばに いたいの

translation.en: Always.
translation.ja: あなたのそばに いたいの

translation.en: I'm not gonna end your life for you.
translation.ja: 僕に君の命は奪えない

translation.en: I'm dying already.
translation.ja: でも私は死に近づいてるわ

translation.en: Every second, I get closer.
translation.ja: 今 こうしていても

translation.en: Older.
That's the way it's supposed to be.
Alice said that she saw me like you.
translation.ja: アリスも予知したのよ

translation.en: -I heard her. -Her visions change.
Yeah, based on what people decide.
translation.ja: その人の決心次第でね

translation.en: I've decided.
So that's what you dream about.
Becoming a monster.
I dream about being with you forever.
translation.ja: 永遠に一緒にいたいの

translation.en: Forever?
And you're ready right now?
translation.ja: じゃ 覚悟はいいね？

translation.en: Yes.
Is it not enough just to have a long and happy life with me?
translation.ja: 僕のそばで幸せに生きてくだけじゃダメか？

translation.en: Yeah.
For now.
[Bella] No one will surrender tonight,
but I won't give in.
translation.ja: 私は あきらめない

translation.en: I know what I want.
